Class Order

java.lang.Object
edu.tamu.csce331.sharetea.models.Order
public class Order extends Object
Order model representing customer transactions in the Sharetea POS system.

This class encapsulates complete order information including customer details, order items, pricing calculations, payment information, and order status tracking. Orders represent the core business transactions in the POS system and link customers, employees, menu items, and payments together.

Key features:

  • Customer and employee association tracking
  • Order item management and pricing calculations
  • Payment method and status management
  • Order lifecycle tracking (PLACED, PREPARING, READY, COMPLETED)
  • Tax and discount calculation support
Since:
1.0

  • Constructor Details

    • Order

      public Order()
      Default constructor for Order.

      Creates a new Order instance with default values. This constructor is typically used when creating new orders that will be populated with data from user input or database operations.

    • Order

      public Order(Long customerId, Long createdBy, String paymentMethod)
      Constructs an Order with specified customer and employee information.

      This constructor is used when creating a new order with known customer and employee details. The order is initialized with default values including PLACED status and zero amounts for financial calculations.

      Parameters:
      customerId - the identifier of the customer placing the order
      createdBy - the identifier of the employee creating the order
      paymentMethod - the payment method to be used
